recipes.method: 1. Soak the rice noodles in warm water for 15 minutes until soft. 2. In a wok or large frying pan, stir-fry the chicken until cooked through. 3. Add the soaked noodles and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes. 4. Add the bean sprouts and stir-fry for another minute. 5. Mix the tamarind paste with some water and add it to the pan, stirring until well combined. 6. Garnish with peanuts and serve hot.
